content.content: In the US more than 75,000 babies and children get severe sepsis a year. More children die from sepsis than from cancer.[^163] Embedded content: https://youtu.be/7f_FxKGEk4E Sepsis is the body's extreme andÂ __life-threatening overreaction __ to an infection. The body attacks itself and can cause tissue damage, organ failure, amputations and death.[^87] ## Neonatal Sepsis Neonatal Sepsis is when babies that are younger than 3 months get sepsis. ### Risk Factors: - Group B Streptococcus exposure during mom's pregnancy - Premature birth - Ruptured membranes (water breaks) more than 18 hours before delivery - IV catheters - Long hospital stay - Exposure to sick people - Infection of the placenta and amniotic fluid[^164][^165] ### Signs & Symptoms: - High or low temperature - Difficulty breathing - Diarrhea - Poor sucking - Cold hands &/or feet - Seizures - Swollen belly - Vomiting - Yellow skin and eyes - Dry diapers for more than 12 hours - Clammy, pale &/or strangely colored skin[^165] Babies may be too young for the recommended vaccinations for the following diseases: - Rubella (German measles) - Varicella (Chicken pox) - Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib) ### Common Infections: - Respiratory synctial virus (RSV) - Cytomegalovirus (CMV) - E. Coli - Candida - Herpes simplex virus (HSV) - Listeria monocytogenes[^165] ## Sepsis in Children ### Risk Factors: - Infected wounds or cuts - Urinary tract infection - Pneumonia - Ear infections - Meningitis[^165] ### Signs & Symptoms: - Fast heart rate - Sleepy, confused or difficult to wake - Severe pain - High or low temperature (fever &/or chills) - Shortness of breath - Pale or discolored skin - Feeling very sick - Low blood pressure - Increase or decrease in white blood cells[^165] ### Prevention: - Childhood vaccinations - Handwashing - Keeping cuts or wounds clean & covered[^165] Embedded content: https://youtu.be/cypQFXPrQD4 Embedded content: https://youtu.be/GU2oiAczTq8 Embedded content: https://youtu.be/RsxTvzF6OG8 [Sepsis and Children from the Sepsis Alliance](https://www.sepsis.org/sepsis-and/children/) [Neonatal sepsis from MedlinePlus](https://medlineplus.gov/ency/article/007303.htm) [Sepsis Kills by the Rory Staunton Foundation for Sepsis Prevention](http://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Sepsis-Kills.png) [^87]: Heron M.
